"Subdue Org Blan":
"A species of Oceanid, the Org Blan, has
appeared on the coast and begun
rampaging. It seems especially hostile
towards ARKS, and could cause serious
problems if left unchecked. ARKS members
are to enter the deepest area and
subdue the Org Blan to ensure the safety
of the surrounding area.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
